basic.description: The course will focus on the study of Italian Romanticism and its relation to English, German, Spanish and French Romanticism. The rise of Realism and Decadentism will also be discussed and examined.
basic.subject: LLCU
basic.title: From the Romantics to D'Annunzio

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     Level 2 or permission of the Dept. of Languages, Literatures and Cultures.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from LLCU232; ITLN232; ITLN432.
Equivalency    ITLN232.
